title: Me being Plat, means im Platinum elo right? Did not pull my rank backwards?
body:
Season 8 made Iron and Grandmaster. In my perspective, Iron means "Lowest of the lowest of players" and Grandmaster means "JUST in between Masters and Challenger". But some people state that it actually just reduced everyone's elo backwards. 

Meaning People who are Bronze are now Iron and Challengers are not Grandmasters. Does that mean im not practically Platinum and im technically Gold elo? 

Me seeing myself almost hitting low Diamond is a boost of confidence to climb. But I also like truth. Am I still technically Gold and me hitting Diamond is just Platinum?
